metadata.title: CVE-2022-1306 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Inappropriate implementation in compositing in Google Chrome prior to100.0.4896.88 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1306` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 100.0.4896.127-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 100.0.4896.127-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 100.0.4896.127-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 100.0.4896.127-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 100.0.4896.127-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '100.0.4896.127-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
